title: Understanding Parenting Challenges
text: Parents who are unaware that their child has Autism Spectrum Disorder (ASD) might face unique challenges. Consider how a lack of awareness can impact their parenting strategies.

title: Ineffective Parenting Strategies
text: Without knowing their child has ASD, parents might use general parenting strategies that are not effective for children with ASD. This can lead to frustration and self-doubt.

title: Seeking Support
text: Parents might not seek out or receive the appropriate support and resources available for children with ASD, which can be crucial for the child's development.

title: Concerns About the Future
text: Parents may have concerns about their child's future, especially if they are unaware of the specific challenges and needs associated with ASD.

hintAnswer: they might use ineffective parenting strategies, which can make them feel frustrated and doubtful of their own parenting abilities
title: Identifying the Main Issue
text: What is the primary issue a parent might face if they are unaware their child has ASD?
choices: they might use ineffective parenting strategies, which can make them feel frustrated and doubtful of their own parenting abilities
they might face difficulties attaining support
they may feel concerned about the future for a child with ASD
